Plot: Post-apocalyptic remake of Casablanca (1942) set in a sleazy nightclub.
Title: Barb Wire
Writer: Chris Warner (characters in comic), Ilene Chaiken (story), Chuck Pfarrer (screenplay), Ilene Chaiken (screenplay)
Actors: Amir Aboulela, Adriana Alexander, David Andriole, Vanessa Lee Asher
tomatoConsensus: Barb Wire could've been fun camp, but Pamela Anderson can't deliver her lines with any dramatic or comedic impact.
